statements: SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_inventory
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE drug_id = 1
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Cabinet A'
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_inventory ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY drug_name ASC
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE drug_id = 3
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE storage_location LIKE '%A%' AND quantity < 50
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Room A' ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT drug_id, drug_name, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_inventory
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM inventory WHERE storage_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-10-01';
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY drug_name DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE storage_location IN ('Warehouse A', 'Warehouse B')
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND quantity < 50 ORDER BY supply_id ASC
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_drugs;
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_drugs;
SELECT id, drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_drugs ORDER BY drug_name DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM drug_inventory WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE storage_location='Room A'
SELECT inventory_id, expiration_date FROM drug_inventory WHERE stock_quantity > minimum_stock_quantity
SELECT supplier_name, contact_number FROM drug_suppliers
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE id=1
SELECT drug_name, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY storage_location ASC
SELECT drug_name, quantity_on_hand FROM chemotherapy_drugs
SELECT * FROM drug_inventory WHERE expiration_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT storage_location, shelf_capacity FROM drug_storage ORDER BY shelf_capacity DESC
SELECT drug_name, quantity_on_hand, storage_location FROM chemotherapy_drugs JOIN drug_storage ON chemotherapy_drugs.storage_location = drug_storage.storage_location
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM drug_transactions WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT drug_name, quantity_on_hand FROM chemotherapy_drugs
SELECT * FROM drug_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC
SELECT d.drug_name, t.transaction_date, t.quantity FROM chemotherapy_drugs d JOIN drug_transactions t ON d.drug_id = t.drug_id WHERE t.transaction_type = 'purchase'
SELECT d.storage_location, s.temperature_controlled FROM chemotherapy_drugs d JOIN drug_storage s ON d.storage_location = s.storage_location
SELECT * FROM drug_inventory WHERE supplier LIKE '%Pharmacy%'
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_drugs;
SELECT drug_name, expiration_date FROM chemotherapy_drugs ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM chemotherapy_drugs WHERE drug_id = 3;
SELECT supplier_name, phone FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 2;
SELECT drug_name, quantity, transaction_date FROM chemotherapy_drugs JOIN transactions ON chemotherapy_drugs.drug_id = transactions.drug_id WHERE quantity < 50;
SELECT location_name, temperature, capacity FROM storage ORDER BY location_name ASC;
